faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Sellez

questions.question: Is Sellez affiliated with my employer?
questions.answer: No, Sellez is an independent platform. We simply verify your workplace email to ensure you're connecting with actual colleagues.

questions.question: How are listings reviewed?
questions.answer: Our team reviews all listings to ensure they meet our community standards and are appropriate for a workplace marketplace.

questions.question: Can I sell services in addition to items?
questions.answer: Yes! You can offer professional services, skills, or even carpooling arrangements to your colleagues.

questions.question: What happens if there's a problem with a purchase?
questions.answer: Our support team is available to help mediate any issues. Since all users are colleagues, most disputes are resolved amicably.

questions.question: Is there a fee to use Sellez?
questions.answer: Sellez is free to use during our beta period. We plan to introduce a small transaction fee in the future to support platform maintenance.

legal.disclaimer: Sellez is not affiliated with or endorsed by any employer. It is an independent platform for facilitating exchanges between colleagues.
legal.terms: By using this service, you agree to our Terms of Use, which prohibit the listing of illegal items, misleading descriptions, or harassment of other users.
legal.privacy: We only collect your organizational email to verify your workplace. Your personal information is never shared with third parties.
legal.moderation: All listings are reviewed before publishing to ensure they meet our community standards and guidelines.
